record.memo: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <query> (( null(report.disabled) or report.disabled=false ) and (operator.name=operator() or audience.type="everyone" or (audience.type="groups" and (groups isin $lo.groups or null(groups))) or (audience.type="assignmentgroups" and (assignment.groups isin $lo.pm.assignments or null(assignment.groups))) or (audience.type="role" and (role=nullsub($G.user.role, "NONE") or null(role))))) </query>
